allow: Bash(python -c "from qdrant_client import QdrantClient; import os; client = QdrantClient(url=os.getenv(''QDRANT_URL''), api_key=os.getenv(''QDRANT_API_KEY'')); print([method for method in dir(client) if not method.startswith(''_'')][:20])")

Bash(python -c "
from qdrant_client import QdrantClient
import os
# Check if search method exists
client = QdrantClient(url=os.getenv(''QDRANT_URL''), api_key=os.getenv(''QDRANT_API_KEY''))
print(''search method exists:'', hasattr(client, ''search''))
print(''query_points method exists:'', hasattr(client, ''query_points''))
")

Bash(python -c "from rag_bot import RAGBot; bot = RAGBot\(\); results = bot.search_similar\(''What is this documentation about?'', top_k=3\); print\(''Results:''\); [print\(f''- Source: {r[""source_url""]}, Content: {r[""content""][:100]}...''\) for r in results]")
